BVR kill chain: Joint RAF/FAA platform with AN/APG-81 AESA radar (200+ km detection), sensor fusion, and internal 4-6 Meteor/AIM-120D bays for stealthy BVR; MADL datalink enables cooperative kills via E-7 cueing to 200 km envelope; 48 total delivered by end-2025, with 39 operational across 617/207 Sqn (RAF) and 809 NAS (FAA). F2T2EA: AN/APG-81 fusion Find; Tracks network; Targets AIM-120D/Meteor; Engage 5th gen; Assess sensor fusion.
Associated products: AN/APG-81 AESA radar, Meteor long-range BVR missile, AIM-120D AMRAAM, E-7 Wedgetail

BVR kill chain: Tranche 2/3 backbone with CAPTOR-E AESA (250 km range), thrust-vectoring, and 6-8 Meteor missiles for high-Pk BVR; integrates with Link-16 for NATO ops; Tranche 1 retirement ongoing (26 active, Falklands-based to 2027), total fleet ~120 pre-retirements but 102 combat-coded post-2025 adjustments. F2T2EA: AESA for advanced Find/Fix; Enables Track at range; Supports Target cueing; Engage Meteor; Assess via EW suite.
Associated products: Meteor long-range BVR missile, EJ200 engine, Typhoon Captor-E AESA radar

BVR kill chain: E-3 replacement with MESA AESA radar (400 km horizon) for off-board targeting and mid-course Meteor updates; full operational capability achieved 2025 with No. 8 Sqn; reduced from 5 to 3, but 2025 defence review eyes additions for persistent BVR coverage. F2T2EA: MESA AESA Find/Fix horizon; Tracks off-board; Targets Meteor updates; Engage directed; Assess coverage.
Associated products: MESA AESA radar, Link-16, Meteor long-range BVR missile

BVR kill chain: ELINT platform with River Joint suite for enemy radar/missile cueing, suppressing threats to enable Typhoon/F-35 salvos; No. 51 Sqn ops integrate via Link-16; all 3 delivered and upgraded by 2025 for GPS-denied environments. F2T2EA: River Joint suite Find threats; Tracks cueing/suppression; Targets IADS; Engage enabled; Assess GPS-denied.
Associated products: River Joint suite, Link-16, F-35B Lightning II

BVR kill chain: Upgraded Global 6000 with Litening pods and SAR/GMTI radar for persistent targeting (200 km range); supports BVR via datalink fusion; fleet expanded to 9 but 8 operational by 2025, OSD 2030 pending Protector transition. F2T2EA: SAR/GMTI Find/Fix persistent; Tracks datalink; Targets fusion; Engage BVR support; Assess Litening.

Retained Global Express-based with ASaC radar (300 km) for cueing despite E-7 arrival; No. 5 Sqn provides gap-filler for networked BVR; upgrades extended service to 2025+ amid delays in replacements. F2T2EA: ASaC radar Find/Fix; Tracks cueing; Targets gap-filler; Engage networked; Assess upgrades.

MRTT with boom/probe refueling for 2+ hour BVR extensions on F-35/Typhoon; No. 10/101 Sqn ops; full fleet operational, enabling carrier strike group sustainment with Queen Elizabeth-class. F2T2EA: Boom/probe extends Track/Engage; Sustains carrier; Targets 2+ hour; Assess fleet.
Associated products: Boom/probe refueling, F-35B Lightning II, Eurofighter Typhoon

BVR kill chain: Persistent UAS with Lynx SAR (50 km) and Hellfire/GBU-12 for attritable BVR support; No. 13/39 Sqn transitioning to Protector RG1 (10 delivered by Nov 2025); integrates datalinks for cueing manned assets in contested airspace. F2T2EA: Lynx SAR Find/Fix persistent; Tracks datalinks; Targets attritable; Engage support; Assess contested.

AESA upgrade for Typhoon with 250 km detection and multi-target tracking; full rollout 2025 for enhanced BVR. F2T2EA: AESA for advanced Find/Fix; Enables Track at range; Supports Target cueing; Engage Meteor; Assess via EW suite.
Associated products: Meteor long-range BVR missile, EJ200 engine, Typhoon Captor-E AESA radar

BVR kill chain: Demonstrator for Typhoon sensor extension and EW roles; first flight 2025 under Tempest program. F2T2EA: Demonstrator for Find via integrated sensors; Tracks with EW; Targets Meteor/SPEAR; Engage internal bay; Assess future ops.
Associated products: Meteor long-range BVR missile, Eurofighter Typhoon Captor-E AESA radar, EJ200 engine

BVR kill chain: Upgraded dual-mode (IR/RF) BVR missile with 80 km range; NG variant IOC 2025 for Typhoon integration. F2T2EA: Medium Engage dual seeker; Tracks Rafale/Typhoon; Targets versatile; Assess NG upgrades.
Associated products: Rafale F4, RBE2-AA AESA radar, SPECTRA EW suite

BVR kill chain: Ramjet-powered BVR missile with 200+ km range; full UK integration on Typhoon/F-35 by 2025. F2T2EA: Ramjet Engage no-escape; Post-Track by Captor-E; Targets Eurofighter/Rafale; Assess active seeker.
Associated products: Eurofighter Typhoon Captor-E AESA radar, Rafale F4, RBE2-AA AESA radar
